mapper.select: select count(*) from XIUXI_APPLY where STF_NO = #{stfNo}

select XA_NO, XIU_NO, XA_WHEN, to_char(XA_START, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') XA_START , to_char(XA_END, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') XA_END , xiu.XIU_REASON, xiu.XIU_APL_YESNO, xiu.XIU_STATE from XIUXI_APPLY xa INNER JOIN XIUXI xiu using (XIU_NO) where STF_NO = #{stfNo} order by XA_END desc

select XA_NO, XIU_NO, XA_WHEN, to_char(XA_START, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') XA_START , to_char(XA_END, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') XA_END , xiu.XIU_REASON, xiu.XIU_APL_YESNO, xiu.XIU_STATE from XIUXI_APPLY xa INNER JOIN XIUXI xiu using (XIU_NO) where STF_NO = #{stfNo} and (XA_START > SYSDATE + 1) order by XA_START
